CaseBox
========
This code allows switching between different cases and geometries and generating variable postprocessing

.. _casebox:

General Loader
---------------
The main loader is called to load any cases and generate posprocessing functions

.. autofunction:: src.PINNBox.PDEBox.RANS.RANS_B_HD

.. autofunction:: src.PINNBox.CaseBox.CaseLoader.initCase

.. autofunction:: src.PINNBox.CaseBox.CaseLoader.makeDir

.. autofunction:: src.PINNBox.CaseBox.CaseLoader.postProTrain

.. autofunction:: src.PINNBox.CaseBox.CaseLoader.getPlotter

--------------
